options.fig-cap: Illustration of a poor graphic summarizing correlated data; the graphic hides the fact that there were repeated measures on the subject.  It is not clear that the responses are in any way correlated.
options.fig-alt: Side-by-side boxplots of the taste ratings for each of the three vendors.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-8

options.fig-cap: Results from a blind taste test comparing how subjects rated the taste of yogurt from three different vendors.  Ratings from the same subject are displayed using the same color.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-9

options.fig-cap: Results from a blind taste test comparing how participants rated the taste of yogurt from three different vendors.  Ratings from the same participant are connected.
options.fig-alt: Line plot connecting taste ratings from the same participant across three vendors.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-22
